display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | End advanced table on PDF

ANp.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
ANp.name: config_info

ANr.caption: Table name
ANr.doc: Name of the table that will be concluded.
ANr.name: table_name

ANs.caption: Table layout
ANs.doc: Choose a style and see if it pleases you!
ANs.name: table_layout
ANs.options: Standard,No Borders,Header Line Only,Light Horizontal Lines,Strong Outer Border,Zebra,Light Horizontal Lines Without Header

ANt.caption: Page break
ANt.doc: Choose if this element will enforce a new page before or after itself.
ANt.name: page_break

ANu.caption: Use table custom margins?
ANu.doc: Below you will be able to set extra margins for your table element. Leave this field as "no" for a default display (will ignore any margin-related numbers below).
ANu.name: table_custom_margins

ANz.caption: Into multi column
ANz.doc: Use "yes" to insert this table into a multi column.
ANz.name: into_multi_column

AOA.caption: Multi column name
AOA.doc: The name of the multi column you're wrapping this element within.
AOA.name: multi_column_name

AOB.caption: This multicolumn width
AOB.doc: Fit content will make the column have the width of their content. Fit available space will extend the column's width to all horizontal avaliable space in the page.
AOB.name: this_column_width

AOC.caption: Into header
AOC.doc: Use "yes" if this element is to be inserted into the header.
AOC.name: into_header

AOD.caption: Into footer
AOD.doc: Use "yes" if this element is to be inserted into the footer.
AOD.name: into_footer

AOE.caption: Into background
AOE.doc: Use "yes" if this element is to be inserted into the background.
AOE.name: into_background

APA.caption: Fixed width size
APA.doc: If you select "Fixed width" in the dropdown above then you must specify a number here. Play with numbers to check the size, but know that the size here is in "points" not "pixels". You can search the web to know more about that unit of measure.
APA.name: fixed_width_column_size
